title: ESQL: Unmute testLookupExplosionManyMatchesManyFields test
body:
I investigated the original issue. There are 2 failures, none are related to this test. Other earlier tests fail with the same failure (timeout, connection refused). 
Also ran the test 50 times locally, no failures. 

Resolves https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/136791
author: julian-elastic

files_changed.patch:
@@ -519,9 +519,6 @@ tests:
 - class: org.elasticsearch.xpack.ml.integration.BasicDistributedJobsIT
   method: testFailOverBasics
   issue: https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/136778
-- class: org.elasticsearch.xpack.esql.heap_attack.HeapAttackIT
-  method: testLookupExplosionManyMatchesManyFields
-  issue: https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/136791
 - class: org.elasticsearch.xpack.inference.qa.mixed.CohereServiceMixedIT
   method: testRerank
   issue: https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/136872

diff:
diff --git a/muted-tests.yml b/muted-tests.yml
index aebdbf85c13f8..41a6c5a4b1ef3 100644
--- a/muted-tests.yml
+++ b/muted-tests.yml
@@ -519,9 +519,6 @@ tests:
 - class: org.elasticsearch.xpack.ml.integration.BasicDistributedJobsIT
   method: testFailOverBasics
   issue: https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/136778
-- class: org.elasticsearch.xpack.esql.heap_attack.HeapAttackIT
-  method: testLookupExplosionManyMatchesManyFields
-  issue: https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/136791
 - class: org.elasticsearch.xpack.inference.qa.mixed.CohereServiceMixedIT
   method: testRerank
   issue: https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/136872
